ee_oio module¶

OIO utility functions for the KMD EE Mox agent.

Many of these functions are generic, but are limited to the functionality needed for integrating with KMD EE.

class ee_oio.DummyResult(uuid)[source]¶

Bases: object

Return a request result when not actually calling LoRa.

json()[source]¶

JSON representation of DummyResult.

class ee_oio.Relation(mode, value, virkning)¶

Bases: tuple

mode¶

Alias for field number 0

value¶

Alias for field number 1

virkning¶

Alias for field number 2

ee_oio.create_bruger(cpr_number, key, name, master_id, phone='', email='', mobile='', fax='', first_name='', middle_name='', last_name='', address_uuid='', gender='', marital_status='', address_protection='', note='')[source]¶

Create a Bruger from the given parameters.

ee_oio.create_indsats(name, agreement_type, no_of_products, invoice_address, start_date, end_date, location, customer_relation_uuid, product_uuids, note='')[source]¶

Create an Indsats from the parameters.

ee_oio.create_interessefaellesskab(customer_number, customer_relation_name, customer_type, address_uuid, note='')[source]¶

Create an Interessefællesskab with the info from the parameters.

ee_oio.create_klasse(name, identification, installation_type, meter_number, meter_type, start_date, end_date, product_address, note='')[source]¶

Create a Klasse, representing a Produkt in CRM.

ee_oio.create_object_dict(oio_class, properties, relations, note, states={'gyldighed': 'Aktiv'}, virkning=None)[source]¶

Create a dictionary for updating or creating an OIO object.

Note, “properties” should really be “attributes”, but we’ll not handle this level of nesting here.

The parameter relations should be a dictionary mapping relation names to Relation values as specified above.

ee_oio.create_organisation(cvr_number, key, name, master_id, phone='', email='', mobile='', fax='', address_uuid='', company_type='', industry_code='', note='')[source]¶

Create organisation with the given information.

ee_oio.create_organisationfunktion(customer_uuid, customer_relation_uuid, role, note='')[source]¶

Create an OrganisationFunktion, representing a Kunderolle in CRM.

ee_oio.create_virkning(frm=datetime.datetime(2018, 1, 31, 16, 26, 50, 192998), to='infinity', user='', note='')[source]¶

Create a Virkning with the dates and other info as given.

ee_oio.delete_object(uuid, service, oio_class)[source]¶

Delete object in sevice with the given UUID.

ee_oio.lookup_objects(service, oio_class, **conditions)[source]¶

Lookup objects of class cls in service with the specified conditions.

ee_oio.lookup_one(service, oio_class, **conditions)[source]¶

Lookup supposedly unique object - fail if more than one is found.

ee_oio.read_object(uuid, service, oio_class)[source]¶

Read object from LoRa, return JSON. Fail (throw 404) if not found.

This function does not include more than one registration period and will thus return the current registration only. Within this registration period, all date dependent values will have the current Virkning period only.

ee_oio.request(func)[source]¶

Decorator to wrap OIO API requests (excluding lookups).

ee_oio.write_object(uuid, properties, relations, service, oio_class)[source]¶

Update bruger with UUID uuid with the given properties and relations.

ee_oio.write_object_dict(uuid, object_dict, service, oio_class)[source]¶

Write object dict provided by caller.
